title: Buy Tickets Segments
custom_preconds:
Given User has Ballpark app [iOS] & [Android] 13.0 or later installed

PENDING 'No Upcoming Event's view/UI [BP-10482](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10482 )
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on Buy Tickets Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has no favorite team selected
AND navigates to the Tickets Tab
And taps on the "Buy Tickets" Section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN No Games please change your filter to view tickets will be displayed in the center of the screen.

Header: Team Select
Copy: Select a team to view their game schedule
(TBD) 

If no favorite team selected, display MLB logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Buy tickets tab for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown No Games page
AND user is shown 'Select Team' button
AND user is shown 'Home Games' button
(TBD) 

If no favorite team selected, display MLB logo

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user select team from team dropdown
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team picker will animate up over the view
AND all Teams will be displayed
AND the team names will be displayed as follows: Location name(City/ or State), Team Name (Check all 30 teams i.e Braves for Atlanta)
AND the team picker will display all team names in alphabetical order.
AND User should see checkmark on the right side indicating team selection made

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects a team from the Team Picker
AND Apply Filter
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the selected team's schedule is displayed
(TBD)

title: View without Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user does not have a favorite team established
AND user navigates to Tickets tab -> Buy Tickets
custom_steps: WHEN no team is selected on the filter

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Buy tickets tab for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Note: TBD 
If no favorite team selected, display MLB logo

title: View With Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user has a favorite team established
AND user navigates to Tickets -> Buy Tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the User taps the Buy Tickets tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the favorited team's events are returned

NOTE: User's favorite team will always be selected by default.

AND User's favorite team will be starred and display at the top of the list

NOTE: User's favorite team will always be selected by default.
AND Display day of week and date # in the left column (this font size should be fixed and NOT change based on device settings)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views each scheduled event presented
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN each event has Away team logo, away team name @ home team cap logo, home team name presented
AND followed by the ticket amount (i.e $36+ in green color font) 
AND followed by Event time (Device/location local time)
AND followed by Venue name (use venue string from data)

title: List View
custom_preconds:
[BP-10428](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10428 )

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user navigates to Tickets tab -> Buy Tickets
custom_steps: When the user navs to Buy Tickets
custom_expected:
THEN List view is scrollable & displayed sequential order
AND Component contains team name, logo, date, start time and home stadium
AND Tap gesture of component leads to t-link URL as a webview in the navigation stack for specified date (if applicable) 
AND List view contains iconography for game promotion (if applicable) 
AND List view content is filterable 
AND List view content contains toggle between list & Cal
AND Month is pinned while scrolling 
AND If t-link is not available for specific date/game, grey out display component

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on "List" in the segmented control
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User should display schedule in List View 
AND the List view is scrollable & displayed sequential order

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reviews the entries in the list
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the entry contains the date
AND the entry contains game information

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reviews the date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the date font remains consistent throughout the list displayed with the day of the week above the date of the event

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reviews the game information
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the entry contains away team logo, away team name 'at' home team logo, home team name
AND the entry contains start time and home venue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reviews the opponent info in the entry
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the opponent logos are displayed correctly in the entry

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user review the game start time and venue location
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game time will properly reflect the user's time zone followed by the venue name

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user review the game start time and venue location
AND game time is TBD
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "TBD" will be displayed instead of a game time

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the entry view contains game promotion(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN List view contains iconography for game promotion

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects a different Home Team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the List view is updated to the selected home team
AND the view is scrollable & displayed sequential order

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user scrolls through different months
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Month is pinned while scrolling

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reviews an entry that DOES NOT have T-link available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the entry is displayed as greyed out (indicating no CTA)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reviews an entry that DOES have T-link available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the entry is displayed as white background (indicating CTA)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user reviews an entry that DOES have T-link available
AND user taps the entry
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is directed to a webview with info on purchasing the ticketed event

custom_steps_separated.content:
[TODO: CONFIRM IF/HOW PITCHING MATCHUP INFO IS DISPLAYED] 

WHEN user review the games in Preview 
AND probable pitchers info available
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the the probable pitcher names will be displayed if available or TBD

title: Calendar View
custom_preconds:
[BP-10429](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10429 )

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user navigates to Tickets tab -> Buy Tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user navs to Buy Tickets
custom_expected: THEN User display with List View and Calendar view toggle at bottom

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on "Cal" in the segmented control
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User should display schedule in Calendar View

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on review Calendar view in Calendar tile
and attempts to scroll up on the Calendar
and attempts to scroll down on the Calendar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Calendar correctly honors the season boundaries that have been set
AND Today will be marked with a blue outline (TBD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User reviews the colors of the Calendar days in Calendar tiles
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the colors are as follows:
Home games are correctly using the selected team's primary color
Away games are white
Spring Training HOME games are dark grey (TBD) 
Spring Training AWAY games are light grey (TBD)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User views games in Preview with game times
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the game time will properly reflect the user's time zone
and the device's 24 hour time setting
and will be displayed underneath the opponent tricode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User views a game in Preview whose game time is TBD
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then "TBD" will be displayed in the date cell underneath the opponent tricode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user display a date with no game scheduled
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the date cell will be empty
and tapping on it will be unresponsive

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is a double header scheduled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "2 gms" should be displayed in the date cell underneath the opponent tricode(TBD)

title: Switching Between List & Calendar Views
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (13.0 or greater)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
AND user does not have a favorite team established
AND user navigates to Tickets tab -> Buy Tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user switches between the Calendar and List views via the segmented controller
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the view changes without any issues
The month being viewed in each segment is retained when switching back and forth
AND Segment controller changes to black color background and white color font indicating user's view selection

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user tap on More Filters
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User display with master sheet of More Filters 

**Filters** - header shown in top middle of the page 
Cancel or X - Top left corner (TBD) 
Reset - top right corner (TBD) 
**TEAM**
User favorite Team or Selected team display with Star 
followed with > icon in same line to select team 

**OPPONENT**
followed with MLB standard logo , Any and > icon  in same line to select team

AND User should also display with  


**TYPE OF GAME**
Options: 
Both, Home and Away

**TIME OF DAY**
Options: 
Any, Day, Night 


**DAY OF THE WEEK** 
Any, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun
AND user also display with **Clear All** and **Apply Filter** option at bottom of sheet

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on **Clear All**
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the all selected filters reset to default state (TBD)

title: Type of Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the downloaded the Ballpark app [iOS]& [ANDROID] 13.0 or greater
AND the user is on Tickets tab -> Buy Tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user tap on More Filters
custom_expected: THEN User display with master sheet of filters that gives control over the other filters type

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user view the **Type of Game** filter
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User display with an options for Type Of Game filter 

Header: **Type of Game**
Body: Select which type of games you's like to see 

Options display in pills:
Any Home Away

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user select Any
WHEN the user select Home
WHEN the user select Away
WHEN  the user taps Apply Filter after making selection
WHEN the user taps on **Clear All**
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the all selected filters reset to default state(TBD)

title: Android - Analytics
custom_preconds:
**TESTING NOTES: THIS CASE REQUIRES TRACKING TO BE VERIFIED - MOST DIRECT WAY TO ACHIEVE THIS IS VIA A PROXY TOOL (.I.E. CharlesProxy)
Setup: Connect to device to Charles to monitor the content passed.

GIVEN the Ballpark application has the BETA ticket (TTR) enabled 
AND the user downloaded the Ballpark app (iOS: 13.0 or greater, Android: TBD[12.12.0? or 13.0])
AND the user is on Tickets tab 
AND network traffic is monitored via Proxy tool (such as Charles/Proxyman)
custom_steps: WHEN accessing/viewing Ticket events within the BP app

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has navigated to TicketsTab
WHEN user taps is on Upcoming section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user display with list of event they have on their account 
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified via proxy tool

*MLB Ballpark : Tickets : Wallet
